message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $10,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your position, but I am still unable to meet above $8,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
